duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in E-Commerce order processing and monitoring while leading by example and motivating staff to complete tasks accurately and timely.
Perform and monitor all returns processing functions related to E-Commerce, ensuring accurate and timely completion.
Provide leadership and motivation to the staff in a polite and positive manner, serving as a good role model and personally conducting oneself in a diligent and professional manner.
Work in a hands-on, active manner, instructing others and personally performing work tasks as needed.
Be sufficiently cross-trained to assist in all Fulfillment Center Departments and assist in the operation of all company sales.
Meet deadlines and respect the merchandise, ensuring that all operations in the Fulfillment Center are completed in a timely and respectful manner.

education_certification.credential: 3 years of relevant work experience in a Fulfillment or materials handling environment, preferably of soft goods
